git remote add otherGit git@github.com:adouwt/test-git-other.git git add . git commit -m "add dist files" git push otherGit master -f cd dist/ && git remote set-url origin git@github.com:adouwt/test-git-other.git && git add . && git commit -m 'push dist files' && git pull && git push origin master -f git remote add origin https://github.com/****/***.git git add . git commit -m "commit message" git push -u origin master 问题： git 仓库A， 和 仓库B 是同个分支， 要实现 不同分支： 仓库A分支brach-a, 提交到 仓库B branch-b
